<h3 id="X38028">X(38028) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(3), X(5)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a^4-2*(b+c)*a^3-(5*b^2-4*b*c+5*c^2)*a^2+2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a+(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38028) = X(1)+2*X(140) = 2*X(1)+X(5690) = 5*X(1)+7*X(31423) = 3*X(2)+X(7967) = 5*X(3)+X(962) = X(3)+5*X(3616) = X(3)+2*X(5901) = 7*X(3)-X(6361) = 3*X(3)-X(9778) = 2*X(3)+X(22791) = 4*X(140)-X(5690) = 10*X(140)-7*X(31423) = X(962)-5*X(5603) = X(962)-10*X(5901) = 7*X(962)+5*X(6361) = 3*X(962)+5*X(9778) = 2*X(962)-5*X(22791) = 5*X(5690)-14*X(31423) = X(5790)+3*X(10246) = 2*X(5790)-3*X(38042) = X(7967)-3*X(10246) = 2*X(7967)+3*X(38042) = 2*X(10246)+X(38042) = 5*X(26446)-7*X(31423)</b>

<p>
X(38028) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 26446}, {2, 10246}, {3, 5603}, {165, 3656}, {381, 5731}, {392, 10202}, {549, 10283}, {551, 10165}, {1385, 11230}, {3534, 9812}, {3576, 5886}, {3653, 25055}, {3654, 16200}, {3655, 5587}, {5657, 10247}, {5790, 7967}, {5882, 38155}, {6265, 11219}, {8236, 38121}, {34123, 38032}, {38031, 38053}<br>
X(38028) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5, 11230), (165, 12100), (549, 10165), (3845, 3817), (5587, 547), (5603, 5901), (5690, 26446), (8703, 17502), (10283, 551), (11230, 1125), (15699, 19883), (22791, 5603), (26446, 140), (37705, 38155), (38022, 25055), (38034, 5886), (38041, 38053), (38042, 2), (38112, 11231), (38138, 10175), (38140, 10171), (38155, 9956), (38170, 38204), (38176, 3828)<br>
X(38028) = complement of X(5790)<br>
X(38028) = X(22791)-Gibert-Moses centroid<br>
X(38028) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 140, 5690), (1, 5444, 5432), (2, 7967, 5790), (3, 3616, 5901), (3, 5901, 22791), (5, 1385, 34773), (10, 15178, 1483), (56, 37737, 6147), (104, 5284, 7489), (632, 1483, 10), (946, 13624, 550), (1125, 1385, 5), (3526, 37624, 8), (3576, 25055, 5886), (3653, 5886, 3576), (4297, 9955, 3627), (5790, 10246, 7967), (7987, 12699, 548), (8227, 18481, 546), (10171, 38140, 5), (10267, 25524, 6924), (11230, 38140, 10171), (15699, 38138, 10175), (17614, 24541, 8728), (34126, 38114, 2), (37616, 37735, 6284), (38022, 38034, 5886), (38032, 38033, 10246)<br>
